sub_title: Transformation Manager at The Coca-Cola Company
summary:
I am multifaceted financial professional known as a driving force that delivers sound guidance within complex settings that demand keen financial, accounting, business, commercial, and technology acumen. I offer a rich blend of project/programme management, leading complex assurance engagements and financial talents gained from a progressive career of strengthening financial operations providing governance, and leading financial transformations that exceed corporate goals and limits risk. I am adept at driving quality improvements and takes on complex financial situations, simplifying them through advanced knowledge of current technologies and industry regulations.

A few of my credentials and strengths include…

	Master’s Degree, International Relations – Minor Commercial Communications
	Association of Chartered Certified Accountants Fellow (FCCA/ACCA)
	Unique Blend of 360 Assurance Experience - External/Internal Audit (including US GAAP, IFRS and SoX) and Leading Implementation of Complex Governance Changes on the Client Side
	Instilling Financial Vision & Discipline
	Business Planning & Analysis
	Project/Programme Management
	Executive Advisory & Decision Support
	Fluent in Czech, English, upper intermediate Spanish, intermediate French and beginning German

I am a strong trusted advisor to owners, stakeholders, and peers; effectively disseminate financial, project/programme and operational principles to all levels of personnel to facilitate change and build consensus across the workplace. Effective leader that excels in fast-paced, demanding environments; utilises global experience through living and working in 20 countries spread across 3 continents to bring excellence to the workplace.

profile_positions.description:
Transformation Manager – Senior Project Manager – Change Manager- Governance
I provide a variety of professional services across the fast paced environment; lead organisation wide transformations, identified areas of opportunity, and facilitate as trusted advisory to senior stakeholders to develop strategies that align with all short and long term growth goals. Double promoted Principal Auditor to Senior Management role.

The following are highlights of the value I bring to the organisation:

	Consistently spearhead change, streamline systems, and implement procedures that have substantially improved governance for the business unit within the firs 12-months; achieved best audit results in over 20 years, no high-risk findings, 4 potential risks versus prior audit with 16 risks (3 high risks, 13 potential risk findings).
	Created and integrated divers procedures to increase productivity and efficiencies across the sector; reduced contracting time from 35 days to 3-5 days, cut processing time by 20-30% YoY, and proposed purchasing process savings (P-cards) which saved the business 300K pa.
	Developed and have implemented strategic training programs, successfully trained over 2000 congregate hours on finance, transformation, and compliance issues.
	Facilitate change initiatives which have included the implementation of new Project Statement Tool, contracting tool and budget shift tools in SEABU – on of the first Bus in EMEA.
	Positioned to provide governance and act as transformations lead for the South and Eastern Africa business; trained and on-boarded all new associates, and utilised talent acquisition skills to hire a Controls & Compliance Manager.
profile_positions.title: Transformation Manager

profile_positions.description:
I was positioned in a highly visible 100% travel role with headquarters in Atlanta, GA-USA; traveled across the globe with key responsibilities to evaluate and improve effectiveness of the Company risk management, control, and governance processes. Led strategic direction on the development of high performance project teams and oversaw daily activities associated with complex financial audits, controlled gap assessments, and facilitated global anti-bribery audits for Coca-Cola global operations.

The following are highlights of the value I brought to the position:

	Consistently spearheaded changes, streamlined financial systems, and implemented procedures that controlled gap assessments for new business acquisitions.
	Traveled over 20 countries to execute complex audits and designed audit procedures for non-standard processes regarding sustainability, non-standard concentrate pricing, and marketing agencies audits.
profile_positions.title: Principal Auditor

profile_positions.description:
I delivered outstanding results for a variety of global clients in diverse sectors including manufacturing, investment funds and the largest kindergarten provider located in New Zealand. Led compliance reviews in Philippine’s, Germany, Papua New Guinea, Solomon Islands, and Vanuatu.

The following are highlights of the value I brought to the position:

	Consistently developed solid relationships with clients to ensure objectives were achieved; performed work on complex audit engagements and ensured compliance with ethical and professional standards of internal audits.
	Held accountable for producing best practice standards, risk reduction, and utilising audit procedures that governed accounting practices, control processes and reporting.
	Successfully increased company revenue by $300K within first 12-months, promoted to manager and worked in collaboration with senior partners to drive efficiencies in audit process and overall firm profitability.
	Strategically led and managed 3-5 clients simultaneously which resulted in being awarded 7 Europe aid engagements in Asia Pacific – PNG, Solomon Islands, and Vanuatu, Philippines.
